gov.nasa.arc.mct.components
Class PropertyDescriptor

java.lang.Object
  gov.nasa.arc.mct.components.PropertyDescriptor

public class PropertyDescriptor
extends java.lang.Object

Provides descriptions of component fields suitable for inspection. java's PropertyDescriptor implements a similar API.

Nested Class Summary
static class PropertyDescriptor.VisualControlDescriptor
          Defines the supported visual control types.

Constructor Detail

PropertyDescriptor

public PropertyDescriptor(java.lang.String shortDescription,
                          PropertyEditor<?> propertyEditor,
                          PropertyDescriptor.VisualControlDescriptor visualControlDescriptor)
Constructs a descriptor. This is typically used for an mutable field.

Parameters:
shortDescription - the label text
propertyEditor - the property editor
visualControlDescriptor - specification of the visual component that will be used to render the value
